### Government Contract Opportunities

**Title:** Monitoring Officer for the Education Sector in Mali
**RFP Number:** PO7442828
**Closing Date:** November 29, 2022, 2:00 p.m. (EST)
**N.B:** This Request for Proposal (RFP) has expired.

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development (DFATD) invites qualified service providers to submit a proposal to provide Monitoring Services for the Education Sector in Mali. This engagement aims to assess project performance, identify areas for improvement, and propose solutions to prevent risks.

**Key Objectives:**

* Evaluate the effectiveness of education projects in Mali and provide recommendations to enhance results
* Identify new opportunities for collaboration and synergies
* Support program planning and development new initiatives
* Facilitate collaboration among stakeholders

**Deliverables:**

* Monitoring report on project performance
* Recommendations for program improvement and risk prevention
* Collaboration and facilitation support for education projects

**Duration:** The estimated duration of this contract is 5 years (2022-2027).

**Location:** The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering services primarily in Ontario (except NCR).

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).
